<title level="1" right="Rules">[Dismissing Activations](/Rules.aspx?ID=3146)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 221 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some item effects can be dismissed, ending the duration early due to you or the target taking action. Dismissing an activation requires using the [Dismiss](/Actions.aspx?ID=2311) action.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
